title: ranked lobby bug
body:
this happeens every now and then but i go into ranked lobby and i cant see any of my summoners or masteries or the team, and then it lags out and i loose lp and have to wait to play another game, please fix this i do not want this to happen to me in promos
it has only happened since the last patch

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like this might be a connection related issue, could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if this helps.
this happens to me, resize the client a little and everything should snap back.
